refinement.text: Increases Elemental Burst DMG by -value0-% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by -value1-%.
After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by -value0-% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
Increases DMG against slimes by -value0-%.
Increases Elemental Burst DMG by -value0-% and Elemental Burst CRIT Rate by -value1-%.
After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by -value0-% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.
Increases DMG against slimes by -value0-%.
After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional -value0-% ATK as DMG for 5s.
If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by -value0-% and DEF is increased by -value1-%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by -value2-%.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by -value0-%.

Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a -value0-% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing -value1-% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt -value2-% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.
ATK increased by -value0-% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of -value1-% ATK. Gain -value2-% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.
CRIT hits have a -value0-% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every -value1-s.
Normal Attacks deal an additional -value0-% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

Iron Point.obtain: ChestsInvestigationSold by Hajime, Master Zhang, and  Wagner

refinement.text: Increases Elemental Skill DMG by -value0-%. After Elemental Skill hits an opponent, the character loses -value1- Energy but regenerates 3 Energy every 2s for the next 6s. This effect can occur once every 10s. Can be triggered even when the character is not on the field.
For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains -value0-% ATK increase and a -value1-% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.
On hit, increases ATK by -value0-% for 6s. Max 7 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s. While in possession of the maximum possible stacks, DMG dealt is increased by -value1-%.
After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by -value0-% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.
Upon dealing damage to an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by -value0-%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all existing stacks.

Increases CRIT Rate by -value0-% and increases Normal ATK SPD by 12%. Additionally, Normal and Charged Attacks hits on opponents have a 50% chance to trigger a vacuum blade that deals -value1-% of ATK as DMG in a small AoE. This effect can occur no more than once every 2s.

HP increased by -value0-%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on -value-value2--% of the wielder's Max HP. When the wielder's HP is less than 50%, this ATK bonus is increased by an additional 1% of Max HP.

Increases Shield Strength by -value0-%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by -value1-% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

For every point of the entire party's combined maximum Energy capacity, the Elemental Burst DMG of the character equipping this weapon is increased by -value0-%. A maximum of -value1-% increased Elemental Burst DMG can be achieved this way.
Increases Normal Attack DMG by -value0-%.
After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional -value0-% ATK as DMG for 5s.
If there are at least 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by -value0-% and DEF is increased by -value1-%. If there are fewer than 2 opponents nearby, ATK is increased by -value2-%.
Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Pyro by -value0-%.

Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a -value0-% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing -value1-% AoE ATK DMG. Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt -value2-% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.
ATK increased by -value0-% of Energy Recharge over the base 100%. You can gain a maximum bonus of -value1-% ATK. Gain -value2-% Energy Recharge for 12s after using an Elemental Burst.
CRIT hits have a -value0-% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every -value1-s.
Normal Attacks deal an additional -value0-% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.
